name: Tanks (itch) (AlexSuperBat)
description:
Just Blast Away Until 1 player reaches 10 Points.

Player 1 Controls: Up Arrow: Forward. Down Arrow: Backwards, Left Arrow: Turn Left, Right Arrow: Turn Right, / = Shoot

Player 2 Controls: W : Forward, S: Backwards, A: Turn Left, D: Turn Right, F: Shoot
